text: Kevin Paul Goodno (born October 22, 1962) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota House of Representatives.https://www.leg.state.mn.us/legdb/fulldetail?ID=10211 In 2004, he was the state's Human Services Commissioner. He attempted to prohibit food stamp recipients from purchasing candy and soda; that policy was rejected by the U.S. Department of Agriculture in May 2004.https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-2004-may-08-na- junkfood8-story.html ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Minnesota Republicans Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: Kevin Goodno
